title.narrative: Services Under Program Project Offices for Results Tracking (SUPPORT II)

description.narrative: (Afghanistan): The activity supports the Mission's monitoring and evaluation systems, strategic communications and public information products, and performance management. The activity provides support services such as facilitating workshops, conferences, and meetings for USAID and its implementing partners, conducting field-based assessments, supporting technical offices in new program/project design, and providing translation services. With FY 2015 funds, SUPPORT II will provide services to improve the efficiency of programs implemented by the Mission's technical offices, including: conducting activity and project evaluations and gender analyses; logistics support to organize and facilitate workshops and conferences; communications and public outreach services; translation services; and information management.
